Title: Doghouse
Plot: When Monica puts Vic on the trail of an escaped fugitive in Farmington, he must continue to prove his worth while playing it straight.  Claudette gets suspicious of the D.A's motives when she and Dutch are assigned to investigate a major drug dealer who ends up being a minor offender.  David seeks an illicit outlet for the troubling feelings caused by his rape.  Vic decides to bring Shane closer as his fears about Shane's connection to Antwon Mitchell rise.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
